user.title: ESP device discovery
user.description: Searching for ESP devices on your network...

pop_input.title: Security authentication required
pop_input.description:
Device "{device_name}" (ID: {device_id}) at {device_ip} requires a PoP (Proof of Possession) value.

Common PoP values:
• Device MAC address
• Custom password from device setup
• Default values like 'abcd1234' or 'esp32'

Check your device documentation if unsure.

data_description.custom_pop: Enter the PoP authentication code set during device configuration.

device_setup.title: Select device
device_setup.description:
Found {device_count} ESP device(s). Select one to add.

Device information:
• Name and node ID
• Security level (0 = no auth, 1 = requires PoP)

You can add additional devices later.

data_description.selected_device: Select the ESP device to add. You'll be prompted for PoP if required.

abort.no_node_id: Device does not have a valid node ID.
